title: The Result of Chanting Hare Krishna | Soulful Japa
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: There is another verse which says in Chaitanya Charitamrita
Atayiva krishnera nama deha vilasa prakritendriya grahiyanayi
hai svaprakasha the holy name of krishna
his body his pastimes
cannot be understood by the blunt material senses
prakritendriya grahiyanayi then how do you know
hai svaprakasha they are manifested independently
when you see them
when you see them when you see them
when you see them when you see them
when you see them when you see them
when you see them when you see them
sincerely serve the shakti-avesha nama with attention
with transcendental faith in his unmanifest presence before you
he will purify us and he on his own he will manifest
that Chaitanya rasa vighraha nama
to our consciousness
to our consciousness senses our spiritual senses
not material senses
Thank you for watching.
